intro: Turritis pseudoturritis, commonly known as the slender turritis, is a flowering plant native to the western United States and parts of Mexico. The plant typically grows in dry, rocky soils and thrives in full sun, often found in desert and chaparral habitats. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species in many areas.
